name: H4Xx0r (Half-Ass Studios)
description:
Welcome to H4Xx0r. In this game you play as one of the two hackers trying to hack every computer on the screen. First hacker to get 400 hacking points wins.

Player 1 Controls:

Use A and D to select a computer

Use W to go to that node

To hack use WASD in the presented order

Player 2 Controls:

Use ◀ and ▶ to select a computer

Use ▲to go to that node

To hack use ▲◀▼▶ in the presented order

You win when the timer runs out and you have the most hacked computers.

A Game by Half-Ass Studios:

Charmaine Wong - Graphics

Adam Gill - Programming

Alexandre Bujold - Programming

Mustafa Kirgul - Programming

Sebastian Swarney - Graphics

Tyler Tam - Music & Sound FX

Wulusi Zhang - Graphics

Carson Mackie - Credits Music
